description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe SA cleanser provides gentle, non-irritating exfoliation without harsh microbeads or grains that can scratch or injure the skin. Suitable for the face and body as well as acne-prone and psoriasis-prone skin. This salicylic acid cleanser contains three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, to help restore the skin barrier, retain hydration and help soothe the skin. This formula is also non-comedogenic, fragrance-free and enriched with vitamin D for extra antioxidant protection.
